web_snippets: Whimsicott is a notorious trickster and a very mischievous Pokémon. It will sneak into houses by slipping through the smallest gaps, and will cause mischief.
Whimsicott is a small, brown, bipedal Pokémon. A mane of cotton-like fluff covers its back, neck, and forehead. Behind it is a green, star-shaped section.
Whimsicott is a Grass/Fairy type Pokémon introduced in Generation 5 . ... What is a good moveset for Whimsicott? Who is faster zebstrika or whimsicott ...
